body:
I do believe you have to logout/login only, when you update X11. 
 
-Allen Bennett 
allenbennett@mac.com 
 
On Apr 18, 2010, at 11:10 AM, Pierre Baguis wrote: 
 
> Should we reboot after updating X11? 
> 
> Thanks, 
> Pierre
